Statistical Rigor Dashboard

Automated auditing of 124 scientific papers across clinical and computational domains.

124 Papers Audited
5.6/10 Average Rigor Score
44% High Rigor Rate
0 Basic Science Papers

⚠️ Recurring Problematic Points

Reporting of blinding or masking procedure is missing. Found in 69 papers
Sample size justification lacks explicit power calculation details. Found in 47 papers
P-values reported without effect sizes (e.g. Odds Ratio). Found in 45 papers
P-values reported only as thresholds (e.g., P<0.05). Found in 43 papers
Longitudinal/clustered data detected without hierarchical modeling. Found in 28 papers
Parametric tests used without documented normality checks. Found in 24 papers

✅ Common Strengths

Exclusion criteria explicitly defined (transparency). Found in 58 papers
Reported diagnostic metrics (AUC/ROC). Found in 44 papers
Detailed software versions provided. Found in 43 papers
Analysis context identifies basic science or bioinformatics (Softened clinical trial requirements). Found in 41 papers
Reported effect sizes (e.g., OR, HR, MD) alongside statistical significance. Found in 41 papers
Explicitly addressed multiplicity correction for multiple comparisons. Found in 18 papers
Paper Title Score Critical Gaps
